SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project_info p JOIN creator_info c ON p.creator_idx = c.creator_idx LEFT JOIN creator_account a ON p.project_idx = a.project_idx JOIN member m ON m.mem_email = c.creator_email WHERE p.project_status = '승인' AND p.funding_start_date <= now()
AND DATEDIFF(p.funding_end_date + INTERVAL 8 DAY, NOW()) >= 0
AND a.status = '입금대기'
AND a.status = '입금완료'
AND ( p.project_code like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR p.project_title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR p.funding_end_date like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR c.creator_name like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR m.mem_name like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR c.creator_email like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR a.fintech_use_num like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )

SELECT p.project_idx, p.project_code, p.project_title, CASE WHEN p.funding_end_date > NOW() THEN '진행중' WHEN DATE(p.funding_end_date) = DATE(NOW()) THEN '오늘 종료' ELSE '종료' END AS project_status, p.funding_end_date, DATEDIFF(p.funding_end_date + INTERVAL 8 DAY, NOW()) AS user_payment_date, DATEDIFF(p.funding_end_date + INTERVAL 16 DAY, NOW()) AS settlement_date, c.creator_name, c.creator_email, a.fintech_use_num, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(funding_pay_amt),0) FROM funding_user WHERE funding_project_idx = p.project_idx) AS funding_account FROM project_info p JOIN creator_info c ON p.creator_idx = c.creator_idx LEFT JOIN creator_account a ON p.project_idx = a.project_idx JOIN member m ON m.mem_email = c.creator_email WHERE p.project_status = '승인' AND p.funding_start_date <= now()
AND DATEDIFF(p.funding_end_date + INTERVAL 8 DAY, NOW()) >= 0
AND a.status = '입금대기'
AND a.status = '입금완료'
AND ( p.project_code like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR p.project_title like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR p.funding_end_date like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR c.creator_name like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR m.mem_name like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR c.creator_email like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR a.fintech_use_num like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
ORDER BY p.project_idx DESC LIMIT #{startRow} , #{listLimit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM funding_user u JOIN member m ON u.funding_mem_email = m.mem_email JOIN project_info p ON p.project_idx = u.funding_project_idx LEFT JOIN project_payment pay ON u.funding_idx = pay.pro_funding_idx LEFT JOIN user_account a ON m.mem_email = a.mem_email WHERE p.project_code = #{project_code} AND u.funding_status != '후원취소'
AND ( u.funding_idx like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR m.mem_name like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') OR m.mem_email like concat('%',#{searchKeyword},'%') )
